sentences.english: So the Romans were in charge of Judea from 63 BCE on.
sentences.chinese: 所以羅馬人自公元前63年開始統治朱迪亞。

sentences.english: Pilate was one of these direct Roman rulers of Judea.
sentences.chinese: 彼拉多是朱迪亞的羅馬直接統治者之一。

sentences.english: The Dead Sea Scrolls were found in caves in the Judean desert.
sentences.chinese: 死海古卷是在朱迪亞沙漠的山洞中發現的。

sentences.english: He may have been a member of the Judean court.
sentences.chinese: 他可能遭到的成員朱迪亞法院。

sentences.english: The next really important thing is the smallness of Judea.
sentences.chinese: 還有一點很重要，就是朱迪亞的渺小性。
